org.fhnw.aigs.BinaerOperatoren.commons

Class StatusMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication.Message
      • org.fhnw.aigs.BinaerOperatoren.commons.StatusMessage

  • public class StatusMessage
extends org.fhnw.aigs.commons.communication.Message
    This message informs the client about the status of an answer, i.e. whether the answer was correct or wrong.
